bill_title: authorize counties to regulate the operation of certain off-road vehicles in highway ditches.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize counties to regulate the operation of certain off-road vehicles in highway ditches. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-20 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding the provisions of § 32-20-12, any board of county commissioners may, by ordinance, prohibit the operation of off-road vehicles in any highway ditch along any section of highway under its jurisdiction. If the operation is prohibited in a highway ditch pursuant to this section, the operation of off-road vehicles shall be permitted, by ordinance, on the adjacent shoulder of the highway. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
